item.title: BILI
item.description: score:23 Chances: The Federal Reserve is slated to cut interest rates multiple times this year, which should cause a flood of liquidity in the markets as lending rates fall. The world of penny stocks is well known to be speculative and is usually the domain of investors possessing a risk seeking profile.
